subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. kicker Russell Erxleben was charged with running an illegal investment scheme that raised more than $2 million, the United States attorney’s office in Austin, Tex., said.
snippet: The former N.F.L. kicker Russell Erxleben was charged with running an illegal investment scheme that raised more than $2 million, the United States attorney’s office in Austin, Tex., said.
